In the year Dec 1992, Nagalakshmi developed a deep desire to have darshan of Bhagavan. When she arrived to receive Bhagavan's darshan, she realised that chanting this Nama - mantra would be the way to reach God. And even before her turn came, all her questions were answered when Bhagavan declared My Father alone exists. There is nothing else, no one else. Bhagavan became her Guru thereafter and she left with a sense of fulfillment
